title: Poems, &c. upon several occasions both English and Latin, &c. / composed at several times by Mr. John Milton ; with a small tractate of education to Mr. Hartlib.
author: Milton, John, 1608-1674.
notes: Latin poems have separate paging and special t.p. with title: Joannis Miltoni Londinensis poemata.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
